comment:
Did a blackberry kolsch spin off from this last Saturday.  I scaled back on fermentables to 1lb clover honey. 3lb blackberry. O.g 1.048  
Fearing a very dark beer I did not pur√©e the blackberries but rather sanitized/rinsed and then crushed while frozen, re froze and racked onto them in primary. It mixed together more then I thought it would, and I think I will have a dark beer anyways.  will post again when finished
